data.title: Tour de France Theme Tune
data.meta_description: As C4 never bettered Peter Shelley's TdF Theme tune that was synonymous with C4 coverage in the 80's I was  pleased to find that @letourdetwit...
data.text:
As C4 never bettered Peter Shelley's TdF Theme tune that was synonymous with C4 coverage in the 80's I was pleased to find that @letourdetwit www.twitter.com/letourdetwit/ has it in a nice easy to download mp3, so each time the adverts come up, I can mute the tv and hit play on the PC! It will be like things never changed

http://tourdetwit.com/ringtone.html

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1IMjb6sU5Mg

roll on the 7th when it hits Chelmsford!

Re: TdF retro theme

This is an awesome find. I love it, reminds me of summer time-trials as a kid. Now I need to nip out and buy a pair of crocheted gloves, will be installing the mp3 on my 'phone directly.

The modern theme has been frenchified with that preposterous accordian motif. Not that I dislike French music, I just prefer Air to Sasha Distel.

I also can't see how it is possible to say that the TdF stages in the Vosges or on the cobbles are boring. What was exciting about the 80's was working out exactly which riders were out of their mind on dope and speed without any testing.

_______________________________________________________________

Border Cycles Frontiera

Hechins Vade Mecum Model 6

Dispatches: Elswick Mistral, Coventry-Eagle, Raleigh Medale, Peugeot Premier (?), Coventry-Eagle Junior

Re: Re:

rusty bodie":3v4fee47 said:

they should bring back cycling that was this exciting!!

i'm totally bored watching the current tour already - all skinny, po-faced,

anonymous riders with black plastic bikes, boring outifits, ugly oakleys, silly wheels . .i could go on and on and onnn.... :roll:

You watched the style of gutless sprinting the riders are doing in this years tour ??

I have seen more exciting shits coming out of my arse :shock:
